channel.title: CVE Feed for Santesoft -- Sante DICOM Viewer Pro
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Santesoft -- Sante DICOM Viewer Pro

item.title: CVE-2023-35986|2024-08-02T16:37:40.595Z -- santesoft -- sante%20dicom%20viewer%20pro
item.description: Sante DICOM Viewer Pro lacks proper validation of user-supplied data when parsing DICOM files. This could lead to a stack-based buffer overflow. An attacker could leverage this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2023-39431|2024-08-02T18:10:20.720Z -- santesoft -- sante%20dicom%20viewer%20pro
item.description: Sante DICOM Viewer Pro lacks proper validation of user-supplied data when parsing DICOM files. This could lead to an out-of-bounds write. An attacker could leverage this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-1453|2024-08-01T18:40:21.169Z -- santesoft -- sante%20dicom%20viewer%20pro
item.description: In Sante DICOM Viewer Pro versions 14.0.3 and prior, a user must open a malicious DICOM file, which could allow a local attacker to disclose information or execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-1453|2024-03-01T18:56:40.511Z -- santesoft -- sante%20dicom%20viewer%20pro
item.description: In Sante DICOM Viewer Pro versions 14.0.3 and prior, a user must open a malicious DICOM file, which could allow a local attacker to disclose information or execute arbitrary code.
